means: 驾游艇的，爱好帆船运动的

sentence.Network_en: A year or two ago I found myself indulging in a spot of yachting in Finnish waters.
sentence.Network_cn: 一两年前，我有一阵子曾迷上了在芬兰海域中进行帆船运动。

sentence.Network_en: We were approached by the Royal Yachting Association to see if we would loan our boat to them.
sentence.Network_cn: 皇家游艇协会的人找过我们，问我们能不能把船借给他们。

sentence.Network_en: I like to go yachting this afternoon.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 体育项目的英语怎么说 ... 滑艇/皮艇 canoeing 帆船运动 yachting;sailing 赛龙船 dragon-boat racing.

一些翻译~（转的~） ... wrestling 摔跤 yachting 帆船比赛 golf 高尔夫球.

list.abs: Newscientist(新科学家) ... World of Embroidery( 绣花世… Yachting World( 游艇世界) Yachting Monthly( 游艇月刊).
所谓超级游艇（Super Yacht）的定义，已随时代发展而更新多次。在上世纪60年代，66尺的“快乐号”就可以算是超级游艇。

entry.def: Yachting is the sport or activity of sailing a yacht.
